main.confirmRestart: Do you really want to restart?

backup.description: Import or export all data in the slideshow.
backup.title: Backup & Restore

clickVisibleHud.description: Toggles the HUD when clicking the mouse or touching the screen.
clickVisibleHud.title: Toggle HUD on click or touch

confirms.backup:
Do you really want to back up all your data?
The backed up content is saved as a `json` file.
confirms.inputExample: Would you like to put an example slide?

Do you really want to reset all settings and slide data?
Once initialized, it cannot be recovered.

Would you really want to restore all your data?
This operation will delete all current data.

hoverVisibleHud.description: If you overlay mouse, HUD will be hidden.
hoverVisibleHud.title: Visible Hover HUD

reset.description: Reset all settings and slide data.
reset.label: Reset slideshow
reset.title: Reset slideshow

visibleContents.description: Set the display of each controller and status.
visibleContents.title: Visible contents

information.description: You can check information about the slideshow.

slides.description: Set the parts related to the slide.

style.description: Set the parts displayed on the screen.

information.message1: If you have any comments on problems or improvements, please use the %{link} page.

guide.description: Pressing a keyboard shortcut as follows executes the function.

table.body_thumbnailDescription: Open the thumbnail image list screen

guide.title: Keyboard guide

animationType.description: Select the transition type when the slide changes.
animationType.title: Transition type

autoplayDelay.description: The amount of time to wait before the slide automatically transitions.
autoplayDelay.title: Autoplay delay

autoplayDirection.description: Set the direction in which the slide automatically transitions.
autoplayDirection.title: Autoplay direction

autoplayPauseOnHover.description: If you place the mouse over the slide area, autoplay is paused.
autoplayPauseOnHover.title: Autoplay pause on hover

captionAnimationSpeed.description: The higher the value, the faster the animation.
captionAnimationSpeed.title: Caption animation speed

captionAnimationType.description: Select the caption transition when the slide changes.
captionAnimationType.title: Caption animation type

initialNumber.description: This is the slide number displayed at the start. (Numbers from 0)
initialNumber.title: Initial slide number

loop.description: Moves the slide from last to first.
loop.title: Repeat

swipe.description: Use swipe operations on touch devices
swipe.title: Swipe

captionPosition.description: Set position of the caption. ex) left,top
captionPosition.title: Caption position

imageScale.description: Set the size of the slide image. ex) horizontal,vertical
imageScale.title: Image scale
